notes: Major Japanese manufacturer with extensive clinical research backing. Wellnex® series offers highly functional collagen peptides with strong bioavailability and efficacy. Benefits include skin moisture improvement, skin elasticity enhancement, anti-aging effects, joint and bone health support, and hair and nail strengthening. Applications include cosmetics (topical and oral), functional foods and beverages, health supplements, and pharmaceutical applications. Premium, clinically validated positioning with Japanese quality standards and global distribution network.
